result.execSummary:
The defendant Habib Amim was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Stalking - Prev Conviction Violent Crime, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.32(2m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $250 DNA surcharge remitted. Pd by bail.

Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with JM (visual or physical proximity), 12 Windswept Way Fitchburg, WI, her former employer Public Service Commission of Wisconsin, the neighbors of JM, JW, Good Shepherd Luthern Church at 5701 Raymond Rd Madison, WI, 7291 County Highway PD Verona, WI, & AM or 5017 Hammersley Rd Madison, WI.

Electronic monitoring for first 6 mo of probation as soon as can be accomplished by DOC.  Completion of certified domestic violence treatment.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample.

timeConds.notes: With huber. Credit does NOT apply. Stayed upon completion of certified domestic violence treatment.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: from defn RE early termination of probation

Upon review and consideration of all the pleadings, filings, correspondence and proceedings relevant hereto, regarding request for early termination of probation, this Court finds that No legal authority has been cited in support of the requested relief, and The law does not permit the court to grant the requested relief. Now, therefore, based upon the Findings of the Court, the requested relief is hereby Denied: See State vs Dowdy, 338 Wis. 2d 565 (2012)
